content:
Hi, everybody! I need the most comprehensive open source EHR application made on FHIR standard, are there any?
Thanks in advance!

EHRs typically aren't "made on" the FHIR standard, though they may provide interfaces. If you're really wanting an EHR, the only open source one I'm aware of is OpenMRS. I know they have some degree of FHIR support. I don't know exactly how much. If you're just wanting an open source FHIR server, there are a few available - look at https://wiki.hl7.org/Open_Source_FHIR_implementations
